title: 3 Ways We Fall in Love & 4 Exercises to Heal Heartbreak Long Term
description:
If On Purpose inspires you, Jay’s exclusive Genius workshops and meditations will take your life to the next level. Go to https://shetty.cc/OnPurposeGenius to learn more.

Ernest Hemmingway once said, “We’re stronger in the places where we’ve been broken.” In matters of love, this can sometimes be forgotten.

On this episode of On Purpose with Jay Shetty, Jay Shetty reflects on love, heartbreak, and how to heal pain and continue to choose love in the future.
author: onpurposepodcast@jayshetty.me (Jay Shetty)
